title: Comedian

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Invite up three people to your nightly comedy show and plan a hilarious joke during the day.
- Don a bulletproof vest at night. (2 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You must send the host the joke you will tell at your show before/at the same time you invite people.
- All three of your audience members will receive your joke at the start of the night. This will not affect their night action.
- Your audience members will give either a positive or negative review of your joke. These will be anonymous.
- You will receive the number of positive and negative reviews you received at the end of the night.
- You may not put yourself in your own audience you nincompoop.

desc:
Post 412
*You gotta stand up for yourself.*
